titles.title: Community Development Priority Projects Assistance Act
A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to provide additional assistance under the community development block grant program for priority projects.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Community Development Priority Projects Assistance Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize community development assistance for priority projects. Prescribes neighborhood eligibility requirements for such priority project grants. Authorizes FY 1988 appropriations.
